about_the_game:
Cyberganked is a CGA CRPG blobber and text adventure.

The Internet is out. You just woke up one day to find it broken. Nothing works.

Usually, when the Internet dies, you just sit and take it. Go for a hike, play with the dogs, drink that awful Chilean wine the Grundersons brought over, much to your chagrin.

But there's another choice you can make. Another way you can go.

What if you took to the streets with your friends? To investigate why the net was down. To find out who was responsible.

And what if you decided to break the face of every single person that got in your way? What if every single garbage human -- normally tucked safely away in the blanket of anonymity the Internet provides -- was also wandering around outside?

It's time for everyone to get what's been coming to them.

content_descriptors.notes: Depictions of strong language, drug abuse and alcohol abuse.

detailed_description:
Cyberganked is a CGA CRPG blobber and text adventure.

The Internet is out. You just woke up one day to find it broken. Nothing works.

Usually, when the Internet dies, you just sit and take it. Go for a hike, play with the dogs, drink that awful Chilean wine the Grundersons brought over, much to your chagrin.

But there's another choice you can make. Another way you can go.

What if you took to the streets with your friends? To investigate why the net was down. To find out who was responsible.

And what if you decided to break the face of every single person that got in your way? What if every single garbage human -- normally tucked safely away in the blanket of anonymity the Internet provides -- was also wandering around outside?

It's time for everyone to get what's been coming to them.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16 or greater.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any modern video card.
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 14
  • Processor: Apple M1 and Intel Core M
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any modern graphics card.
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

name: Cyberganked

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 98, 7, 8 or 10
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any modern graphics card
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
